SELECT ID id , MEM_NAME memName , FN_DEPT_NAME(ID) deptName , FN_POS_NAME(ID) position , DATE_FORMAT(LAST_LOGIN_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %T') lastLoginDt , LOCK_YN lockYn , AUTH_CODE authCode , MEMBER_SIGN_TB.ATCH_FILE_ID atchFileId , FN_GET_IMAGE (MEMBER_SIGN_TB.ATCH_FILE_ID,0) sgnUrl , IF (SECRET_TB.MEM_ID IS NULL, 0, 1) secretYn FROM MEMBER_TB
LEFT JOIN MEMBER_SIGN_TB ON MEMBER_SIGN_TB.MEMBER_SIGN_SEQ = (SELECT MEMBER_SIGN_SEQ FROM MEMBER_SIGN_TB sub WHERE sub.MEMBER_SEQ = MEMBER_TB.MEMBER_SEQ ORDER BY INS_DT DESC LIMIT 1)
LEFT JOIN SECRET_TB ON SECRET_TB.MEM_ID = MEMBER_TB.ID AND SECRET_TB.STATE != 'D'
WHERE 1=1 AND ID = #{id} AND PASSWORD = #{password}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER_TB SET FAIL_PASS_CNT = FAIL_PASS_CNT+1 WHERE 1=1 AND ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FAIL_PASS_CNT failPassCnt , LOCK_YN lockYn FROM MEMBER_TB WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER_TB SET LOCK_YN = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND ID = #{id}
